definition: Qin Shihuang (259-210 BC), the first emperor
primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
not expected at the outset (idiom)/unforeseen/to be surprised by the turn of events

sentences.english: Xi'an City Wall dates back to the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 西安古城牆始建於明朝。

sentences.english: It's built in the nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 埃菲爾鐵塔始建於十九世紀。

sentences.english: That day Fuchida gave his heart to Christ.
sentences.chinese: 從那天始，淵田歸向基督。

sentences.english: Zhejiang Dayu assembly equipment manufacturing company was founded in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 浙江大宇縫製設備製造有限公司始建於1998年。

sentences.english: The national flags of the two countries were flying at the square in front of the Presidential Palace which was built in the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 始建於16世紀的總統府廣場上飄揚着中阿兩國國旗。

sentences.english: The Kuan Im Temple(Guan Yin.Miao) in Macau was first build over 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 位於澳門的觀音廟始建於600年前。

sentences.english: At stroke of midnight God shall win.
sentences.chinese: 現在始與上帝鬥，午夜帝勝他歸鄉。

sentences.english: The Yantai Muping area canal Junior middle school built in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 煙臺市牟平區水道初級中學始建於1982年。

sentences.english: Zhenyuan ordained at East Bridge in rivers and mountains, was built in the Ming Dynasty Hongwu years.
sentences.chinese: 位於鎮遠縣城東中河山，始建於明朝洪武年間。

sentences.english: The hall was first built in 1406 and later repaired many times.
sentences.chinese: 這個大殿始建於1406年隨後曾多次維修。

sentences.english: The process never ends; it constantly moves back upon itself to go forward.
sentences.chinese: 這過程永無止盡，總是週而復始的繼續向前。

sentences.english: RECIFE is one of the oldest settlements in Brazil, dating from 1535.
sentences.chinese: 是巴西最古老的居住地之一，始建於1535年。

sentences.english: I will maintain the utmost respect for human life, from the time of conception.
sentences.chinese: 對人類自其生命受胎之時始，就給予至高無上的尊重。

sentences.english: Hong Li, Dongguan City Furniture Co. , Ltd. was founded in 1993.
sentences.chinese: 東莞市弘力傢俱有限公司始建於1993年。

sentences.english: Leaders should be broad-minded enough to tolerate different opinions.
sentences.chinese: 領導者應該心胸開闊，始能容忍不同的主張。

sentences.english: Many receive advice, only the wise profit by it.
sentences.chinese: 許多人聽到忠告，唯智者始能受益。

definition: self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
